title: 100% Missing proposals since 4.0.5
body:
My validators started to miss proposals after shapella, it got a lot worse after version 4.0.5. 
Running Mev-Boost, tried to remove relays with the worst network delays and turned it off since last week, but problem still persists. The proposals are either missed or reorged for being too late.

There is a issue being discussed within mev-boost, but apparently the problem seems to be Prysm's fault (there are other users logs available). Can check it here: https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/issues/519

Since turning mev-boost off last week I've got 3 reorgs I assume for being too late in the slot.

Mev-boost devs seems to agree the problem is Prysm taking too much time...

https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/issues/519#issuecomment-1579451852 
 
I'm a solo validator, far from US and EU, internet link is stable and redundant (> 500mb), running ubuntu on a vm with 6core amd64, 24GB ram and RAID 1 SSD.
